title: Kaia Gerber, 18, bundles up for a stroll in New York amid rumored romance with Pete Davidson, 25
text:
She is at the center of romance rumors with Pete Davidson.

But 18-year-old Kaia Gerber was glimpsed enjoying a solo stroll in autumnal New York City at the beginning of the weekend.

The daughter of Cindy Crawford warded off the chill in a thick color-block jacket and accessorized with a Yankees baseball cap.

Showbiz legacy: Kaia Gerber, 18, was glimpsed enjoying a solo stroll in autumnal New York City at the beginning of the weekend

Kaia's outing comes two days after Pete, 25, was glimpsed emerging from the teen model's apartment grinning and carrying a Louis Vuitton duffel bag.

Pete had been spotted Wednesday enjoying a brunch date with Kaia in New York - and he was seen leaving her apartment that day as well.

An eyewitness spotted Kaia and Pete at Sadelle's on Wednesday and posted an Insta Stories photo that got picked up by The Morning Toast.

On-brand: The daughter of Cindy Crawford warded off the chill in a thick color-block jacket and accessorized with a Yankees baseball cap

A Page Six source insisted that Pete is 'just friends' with the teenage model but confirmed that he did indeed stop by her place Wednesday.

The Saturday Night Live actor stepped out with Kaia a week after his split from Margaret Qualley, the actress daughter of Andie MacDowell.

Pete had a long-term relationship with Larry David's daughter Cazzie and then went on to have a brief high-profile engagement with Ariana Grande last year.

Backdrop: Kaia's outing comes two days after Pete, 25, was glimpsed emerging from the teen model's apartment grinning and carrying a Louis Vuitton duffel bag

In the wake of their failed romance, Ariana released a breakup album called Thank U, Next and Pete took up with Kate Beckinsale, 46.

Kate and Pete confirmed their relationship by kissing in the stands at a hockey game this March, one day after her show The Widow premiered on Amazon Prime.

Kaia and her brother Presley are Cindy's children by the latter's husband Rande Gerber, who helped found Casamigos with George Clooney and Mike Meldman.
description: She is at the center of romance rumors with Pete Davidson.
